Pre-Game Insights: Namibia overcame Oman in a thrilling Super Over on Monday
Scotland got off to a rollicking start against England before the rain intervened and the match was called off
Namibia and Scotland have won three of their last five T20I matches
Namibia and Scotland have faced each other thrice in T20Is and Namibia has won all these three encounters
Interestingly, they have won the toss on all three occasions
The pitch at the famous Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados will assist seamers in what are expected to be overcast conditions on Friday
The team batting first has won 17 of the 27 matches at the venue
The average score batting first is 160 for 7 while the average score chasing is 140 for 7
The highest score at the venue is 224 - posted by the West Indies against England in 2022
The chance of winning increases to 60% after winning the toss at Barbados
